de.linearbits.subframe
Class Benchmark

java.lang.Object
  de.linearbits.subframe.Benchmark
Direct Known Subclasses:
BenchmarkSynchronized
public class Benchmark
extends java.lang.Object

The central benchmark class. Allows collecting measurements and returning the results as a csv file

Author:
Fabian Prasser
